body_html: Hi, I also met the same problem with you. The error message is cp: cannot stat 'output/bazel': No such file or directory. And I followed this commit https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/e59d3a00ad4861c5e64ef90860d56316377bd50e and tried several times but it still doesn't work. Any thoughts?

body: Hi, I also met the same problem with you. The error message is cp: cannot stat 'output/bazel': No such file or directory.
